text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Gharbia Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Flag of Gharbia Governorate.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Gharbia in Egypt.svg | map_caption = Gharbia Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Tanta (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1,942 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 5066000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Gharbia Governorate is a governorate of Egypt. The capital city is Tanta. The largest city in Gharbia is El Mahalla El Kubra. ==Cities== *El Mahalla El Kubra *Kafr El Zayat *Samanoud *Tanta *Zifta *El Santa *Kotoor *Basyoun ==References== Category:Governorates of Egypt
